column1: Excited to welcome President @realDonaldTrump back to Minneaota! During Monday’s Mankato rally we will hear the President’s message of restoring & maintaining America’s greatness by Keeping America Safe creating economic opportunity and defending our Constitutional rights! #MN01
Mr. President thank you for your extraordinary leadership support and endorsement. I look forward to continuing our work to restore and maintain America’s greatness. #MN01 https://t.co/TSAzT85w6U

To save American lives we must also flatten the unemployment curve. I stand with President @realDonaldTrump Vice President @Mike_Pence and all who are working to #ReOpenAmerica and #ReopenMinnesota safely responsibly and promptly. https://t.co/62FOCzqvgk
